channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- SSO Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- SSO Server

item.title: CVE-2022-27620|2024-08-03T05:32:59.935Z -- synology -- sso%20server
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in webapi component in Synology SSO Server before 2.2.3-0331 allows remote authenticated users to read arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.
